law.catch_line: If an applicant qualifies for a license under this subtitle, the Board shall send the applicant a no...
law.text:
If an applicant qualifies for a license under this subtitle, the Board shall send the applicant a notice that states that:
the applicant has qualified for the license; and
the Board will issue the license to the applicant on receipt of a license fee established by the Board in accordance with § 5-205 of this title.
